Project 2:- DES

Key and Datas

Key = Security
Key in Hexa - Decimal = 5345435552495459
Text = I Like Computer Class.
Above text is divided into three block.

Text 1 Block = I Like Com

Text 2 Block = puter Cla
Text 2 Hexa-Decimal = 5055544552434c41
Text 2 Cipher Text = 55DFFFEC0656378D

Text 3 Block = ss
Text 3 Hexa-Decimal = 5353000000000000
Text 3 Cipher Text = 7D1B372D55B51764
